dialogs.line: Ah, a traveler! My companion, the other knight, spoke of you. I see you’ve chosen to journey without armor. They hold great respect for your resolve.
It is no easy path, yet it speaks of your faith in both your allies and your own swiftness.
Hmph. Faith and agility won’t stop an arrow from finding its mark. There is still much to fear.
Pay no heed to his warnings. Your choice is a noble one. Together, we shall face the perils ahead with unity and strength.
Yet where will you go after this? How will you become a hero for your people without the protection of armor?

dialogs.question: So, friend, what will you do now? Will you take the armor, or strive to find a new path with your allies?
dialogs.answer0: I’ll take the armor to become a hero, even if it reduces agility.
dialogs.answer1: I’ll go without. My new allies are protection enough.

dialogs.line: A wise decision. At least now you’ll have some defense in the treacherous forest ahead.
If this is your path, walk it boldly. But remember, no armor can replace the strength found in the bonds of community.
A fine choice! By placing trust in others, you’ve embraced a path that leads to connection and shared strength!
Hmph. Bold, but risky. Just remember, no one can protect you better than you can protect yourself.
So, you chose to don the armor. My companion hoped you’d lean more upon us, but the choice is yours to make.
Bah! Trust may comfort the soul, but steel keeps you breathing. And judging by your wounds, you need a lot more of it!
Are you certain this is the protection you seek? Remember, weight can hinder as much as it guards.
But you want to become a hero for your people, don’t you? You can’t do that without armor!
Perhaps the path forward is not forged by steel, but by finding allies who accept and strengthen you as you are.

dialogs.question: What will you do now? Will you strengthen your armor further, shed some of it to trust in others, or maintain balance?
dialogs.answer0: I’ll take more armor protection outweighs cost of agility.
dialogs.answer1: I’ll shed some armor. I want to trust in new allies.
dialogs.answer2: I’ll keep what I have. A balanced choice feels right.

dialogs.line: Ah, an even wiser choice! Extra armor will serve you well! You will soon be a hero for your people!
If this is what your heart tells you, I shall not dissuade you. But remember... true strength lies in the spirit, not just the steel.
Ah, you’ve chosen to lighten your burden. My companion will be glad to hear it!
Together, we will face any challenge as steadfast comrades.
Hmph. So be it. Just don’t look to me when regret catches up.
Keeping what you have? A fair decision, I suppose.
Just be sure to remain watchful.
A measured choice. Stay vigilant, friend. With or without armor, we stand united.
